title: We have an open postdoc position on graph representation learning!
Paper with George, Nikos, and Michalis got accepted to ASONAM 2023!
Paper with Jhony, Konstantinos, and Thierry got accepted to CIKM 2023!
Paper with Alexandre and colleagues from Mila – Quebec got accepted to ICML 2023!
Two paper got accepted to ICASSP 2023!
We have an internship position on the design of deep GNNs (jointly with Jhony H. Giraldo from Télécom Paris)!
Surabhi Jagtap defended her Ph.D. on Multilayer Graph Embeddings for Omics Data Integration in Bioinformatics!
Paper with Surabhi, Abdulkadir, and our colleagues from IFP Energies nouvelles Aurelie, Frederique, and Laurent got accepted to Bioinformatics!
Paper with Surabhi and our colleagues from IFP Energies nouvelles Aurelie, Frederique, and Laurent got accepted to BMC Bioinformatics!
Paper with Abdulkadir and Apostolos got accepted to ASONAM 2022!
Paper with Alexandre got accepted to CIKM 2022!
Paper with Bin, Dimitris, Grigorios, and Apostolos got accepted to Briefings in Bioinformatics! This was the outcome of a great collaboration with the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki.
I will be an invited speaker at the Advanced Topics in Machine Learning: Graph Representation Learning summer school organized at the Technical University of Denmark on August 22-26!
Paper with Abdulkadir and Yanning got accepted to IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE)!
I will be visiting the Department of Computer, Control and Management Engineering at Sapienza University of Rome in April-May 2022, under a Sapienza Visiting Professors grant!
Alexandre received a Mitacs Globalink fellowship to pursue research on graph representation learning for climate change at Mila - Quebec AI Institute!
George Panagopoulos defended his Ph.D. thesis! He will be joining Amazon Labs in Luxembourg!

We have open internship positions in the field of machine learning on graphs  with applications in (i) social media and (ii) biomedical data analysis. Please contact me by email if you are interested!
Jhony Giraldo (La Rochelle University) is joining the group as a visiting PhD student under a DATAI PhD mobility grant!
Paper with Surabhi and collaborators from IFP Energies nouvelles got accepted to CIBB 2021!
Paper with Alexandre accepted to ECML PKDD 2021!
We have an open Ph.D. position on Robust Graph Representation Learning and Applications in Misinformation Detection, jointly supervised by Thomas Bonald (Télécom Paris) and me!
Paper with Surabhi, Abdulkadir, Aurélie, Frederique and Laurent got accepted to EUSIPCO 2021!
Abdulkadir defended his Ph.D. thesis! He will be joining the Technical University of Denmark (DTU Compute) as a postdoc researcher!
New paper with Abdulkadir got accepted to the Pattern Recognition Letters journal!
New tutorial with George on "Influence Learning and Maximization" at ICWE (online)!
I have received the Young Researchers grant (ANR-JCJC) from the French National Research Agency for my project "GraphIA: Scalable and Robust Representation Learning on Graphs"!
We received a best paper honorable mention award at ICWSM 2020!
Paper with Chloe, Antoine and Paul-Henry  got accepted to the DKE Journal!
Paper with George and Michalis got accepted to ICWSM 2020!
Paper with Abdulkadir got accepted to AAAI 2020!
Our survey article on Core Decomposition of Networks got accepted to the VLDB Journal!
We are organizing the TextGraphs 2020 workshop, co-located with COLING in Barcelona, Sept. 2020!
Paper with Abdulkadir got accepted to IEEE GlobalSIP 2019!
Two papers got accepted to ASONAM 2019!
I am looking for interns interested to work on graphs and machine learning! Please, see here for more details and drop me an email if you are interested!

Consider applying to the 2019 Summer School in Artificial Intelligence at CentraleSupelec! Two weeks in Paris, an amazing program in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Computer Vision, Network Science and many cultural activities!

I am co-organizing a special session on Machine Learning with Graphs: Algorithms and Applications at the 28th International Conference on Artificial Neural Networks (ICANN), in Munich, Germany, September 17-19, 2019 (with Danai Koutra and Evangelos Papalexakis)!
Paper with Abdulkadir got accepted to NIPS workshop on Relational Representation Learning!
I am on the program committee of ICML 2019 and The Web Conference 2019!
I was recognized as one of the 30% highest-scoring reviewers for NIPS 2018!
Tutorial with Michalis and Giannis got accepted to CIKM 2018!
Paper  with Jordi, Julian and Michalis was accepted to Knowledge and Information Systems (KAIS) Journal!
I am on the program committee of NIPS 2018 and The Web Conference 2019!
We received the Best Paper Award at TextGraphs@NAACL-HLP 2018!
Invited talk at the diNO Seminar on Data Analytics at Paris Descartes University, hosted by Prof. Themis Palpanas!
Internship position and follow-up PhD position (Spring/Summer/Fall 2018) on Bioinformatics Graph Processing for Multi-omics Networks. For more information check here!
Paper  with Konstantinos and Michalis was accepted to TextGraphs@NAACL-HLP 2018, New Orleans, Lousiana!

I am co-organizing the 3rd International Workshop on Learning Representations for Big Networks (BigNet 2018), co-located with the Web Conference 2018, in Lyon, France, April 23, 2018 (with Jie Tang, Michalis Vazirgiannis and Yuxiao Dong)!
An internship position in the area of graph mining and learning is available. Drop me an email if you are interested!
I am excited to be joining CentraleSupélec, University of Paris-Saclay as an Assistant Professor!
Three short papers were accepted to the Complex Networks 2017 conference, that will be held in Lyon, France, Nov 29 - Dec 1, 2017!
I will be on the program committee of WWW 2018 and AAAI 2018!
I will be teaching a new graduate-level course on Graph Mining and Network Analysis at UC San Diego, at the Spring Quarter 2017!
I am co-chair of the 2017 Information Theory and Applications (ITA) Workshop, in San Diego, February 12-17, 2017!
Our tutorial with Michalis on Graph-based Text Representations will be presented in EMNLP 2017, in Copenhagen, Denmark, September 7–11, 2017!
I will be on the program committee of IJCAI 2017!
Paper with Marc and Michalis accepted to the SDM 2017 conference, that will be held in Houston, Texas, April 27-29, 2017!
I am co-organizing a special session on Natural Language Processing for Social Media Analysis at SPECOM 2017, in Hatfield, England, UK!
I was invited to give a talk at the UCSD Artificial Intelligence Seminar!
I joined UC San Diego as a data science postdoctoral scholar!
I will be on the program committee of AAAI 2017!
Our demo paper has been accepted at the ICDM 2016 conference, that will be held in Barcelona, Spain, December 12-15, 2016!
